summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued to R. Adams by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding their appearance and production of all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein. The subpoena is dated August 15, 2019, and requires appearance on August 20, 2019, as part of an investigation into alleged violations of federal conspiracy, false statements, and obstruction statutes.

persons.context: Signed the subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

connections.description: The subpoena commands R. Adams to produce all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein, indicating Adams is a person of interest in the investigation concerning Epstein.
Berman, as U.S. Attorney, issued the subpoena legally commanding Adams to appear and produce documents.

keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued to an individual named R. Adams on August 15, 2019, as part of the federal investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.
The subpoena commands R. Adams to appear before the grand jury on August 20, 2019, and to produce all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein.
The investigation concerns alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 371 (conspiracy), 1001 (false statements), and 1519 (obstruction).
The subpoena has a broad scope, covering documents, records, correspondence, and electronically stored material from any location, including foreign jurisdictions.
The subpoena was issued under the authority of Geoffrey S. Berman, the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York at the time.
